text:
[Verse]
City lights they shine so bright
In the noise of the night
Looking for some peace and quiet
In the heart of the riot

[Verse 2]
Faces passing in the blur
Voices blend into a slur
Trying hard to find a way
In the rush of the day

[Chorus]
Lost in the crowd oh lost in the crowd
Searching for a piece of silence
Lost in the crowd oh lost in the crowd
Hungry for a hint of calmness

[Verse 3]
Every street looks just the same
Every block a maze of names
Lost in patterns left and right
In the chaos of the night

[Chorus]
Lost in the crowd oh lost in the crowd
Searching for a piece of silence
Lost in the crowd oh lost in the crowd
Hungry for a hint of calmness

[Bridge]
Maybe in this sea of faces
I'll find my spaces
Maybe in this crowded place
I'll find my pace
title: Lost in the Crowd
